figure_1: Distribution of estimated latent change in AARC-Gains (upper left panel) and AARC-Losses (lower left panel) and change in the gains-to-losses ratio (right panel) across a two-year interval in very old age
figure_2: Forest plot of estimated directional effects of health, cognitive function and engagement with life on perceived age-related losses (left panel, filled circles) and gains (right panel, filled circles). Estimates for these effects from a controlled model (i.e. that allows for potential reverse causation) are displayed as open circles in each second line.
